Brownsville.Sunrise Mall (Brownsville, Texas): Sunrise Mall is an enclosed shopping mall in Brownsville, Texas, United States. It was opened in 1979, only five years after the town's other mall, Amigoland Mall. Sunrise Mall features more than 100 stores, including five anchor stores (Bealls, Dick's Sporting Goods, Dillard's, JCPenney, and Sears), as well as a food court and a Cinemark movie theater.
